Corporate+Risk Management+Mitigation Pla.EXPLANATION: Percentage of risk mitigation plans that are successfully implemented according to the defined objectives and criteria.
Corporate+Risk Management+Mitigation Pla.FORMULA: (Number of Successfully Implemented Mitigation Plans / Total Number of Mitigation Plans) * 100

Corporate+Risk Management+Mitigation Pla.EXPLANATION: Adherence to the scheduled timeline for executing risk mitigation plans, measured as on-time completion versus delays.
Corporate+Risk Management+Mitigation Pla.FORMULA: (Number of Mitigation Plans Completed on Time / Total Number of Mitigation Plans) * 100

Corporate+Risk Management+Mitigation Pla.KPIS: Number of mitigated risks per quarter.
Corporate+Risk Management+Mitigation Pla.EXPLANATION: Total number of risks that have been effectively mitigated during a quarterly period.
Corporate+Risk Management+Mitigation Pla.FORMULA: Total Number of Risks Mitigated in the Quarter

Corporate+Risk Management+Mitigation Pla.EXPLANATION: Financial savings realized from implementing risk mitigation efforts compared to the cost of those efforts.
Satisfaction level of stakeholders with the results of risk mitigation efforts, measured through surveys or feedback.
Corporate+Risk Management+Mitigation Pla.FORMULA: Average Satisfaction Score from Stakeholders Regarding Mitigation Outcomes

Corporate+Risk Management+Mitigation Pla.EXPLANATION: How often adjustments are made to existing risk mitigation plans based on changing conditions or new information.
Corporate+Risk Management+Mitigation Pla.FORMULA: Total Number of Adjustments Made to Mitigation Plans / Total Time Period

Corporate+Risk Management+Mitigation Pla.EXPLANATION: Financial return on investment for risk mitigation plans, calculated as the ratio of benefits gained to costs incurred.
Corporate+Risk Management+Mitigation Pla.FORMULA: (Cost Savings from Mitigation Efforts / Cost of Mitigation Efforts) * 100

Corporate+Risk Management+Mitigation Pla.EXPLANATION: Efficiency of the costs associated with planning risk mitigation efforts relative to the outcomes achieved.
Corporate+Risk Management+Mitigation Pla.FORMULA: Total Cost of Mitigation Planning / Total Number of Mitigation Plans
